mapper.insert: insert into t_food_menu (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, SKUID, MENUSERIAL, SKUTYPE, SKUTYPENAME, MENUDATE, MENUPERIOD, MENUSTARTTIME, MENUENDTIME, STATUSTEXT, STATUS, PRICE, OFF, MENUNAME, SKUFROM, SKUFOR, SKUFORNAME, MENUDATETEXT, MENUPERIODTEXT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuserial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skutypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menudate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuperiod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menustarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{menuendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{off,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skufrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skufor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuforname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menudatetext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuperiodtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_food_menu set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUSERIAL = #{menuserial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUTYPE = #{skutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUTYPENAME = #{skutypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUDATE = #{menudate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUPERIOD = #{menuperiod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUSTARTTIME = #{menustarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MENUENDTIME = #{menuendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUSTEXT = #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFF = #{off,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUNAME = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUFROM = #{skufrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUFOR = #{skufor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUFORNAME = #{skuforname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUDATETEXT = #{menudatetext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUPERIODTEXT = #{menuperiodtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, SKUID, MENUSERIAL, SKUTYPE, SKUTYPENAME, MENUDATE, MENUPERIOD, MENUSTARTTIME, MENUENDTIME, STATUSTEXT, STATUS, PRICE, OFF, MENUNAME, SKUFROM, SKUFOR, SKUFORNAME, MENUDATETEXT, MENUPERIODTEXT from t_food_menu where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, SKUID, MENUSERIAL, SKUTYPE, SKUTYPENAME, MENUDATE, MENUPERIOD, MENUSTARTTIME, MENUENDTIME, STATUSTEXT, STATUS, PRICE, OFF, MENUNAME, SKUFROM, SKUFOR, SKUFORNAME, MENUDATETEXT, MENUPERIODTEXT from t_food_menu
